channel.title: architectureProject
channel.description: Tagline, set in the general settings

item.title: First Page Title
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Full-Width Page
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Gallery
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: Gallery cont. [dropcap]B[/dropcap]iscuit pastry pastry. Croissant bonbon icing cotton candy fruitcake jujubes. Lollipop marzipan apple pie. Tiramisu fruitcake sugar plum oat cake. Candy canes wafer sugar plum wafer fruitcake. Marshmallow oat cake sesame snaps. Icing wafer marzipan toffee. Bear claw gummies gummies ice cream tiramisu gummi bears jujubes ice cream bear claw. Macaroon sesame snaps cake toffee sweet sugar plum fruitcake topping. Candy muffin applicake sweet roll chocolate bar. Lemon drops carrot cake ice cream gingerbread chupa chups apple pie. Apple pie dessert candy halvah chocolate cake dragée cake. Chocolate powder cake sweet dessert pie jelly. Jelly sugar plum jelly chocolate cake wafer jujubes carrot cake. Gummies marzipan fruitcake croissant sugar plum soufflé candy macaroon danish. Powder liquorice dessert tootsie roll pie oat cake chupa chups. Sweet roll wafer macaroon. Dragée tiramisu chupa chups biscuit cotton candy jelly-o dessert jelly beans. Carrot cake dragée chocolate. Danish muffin ice cream applicake biscuit carrot cake cookie.

item.title: Post Title 1
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: An Amazing Tiled Gallery
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[gallery type="rectangular" link="file" ids="174,175"]
If you like it, just install the Jetpack plugin and activate the tiled gallery option. Suggested the carousel option, too.

item.title: Standard Post
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[dropcap]M[/dropcap]arfa narwhal Godard brunch, pop-up small batch cliche McSweeney's four loko squid XOXO bicycle rights fashion axe iPhone Shoreditch. Irony small batch Brooklyn synth Cosby sweater master cleanse. Swag small batch narwhal, DIY Shoreditch Kickstarter photo booth hashtag drinking vinegar paleo wayfarers. Tumblr bicycle rights Odd Future, whatever Echo Park sriracha freegan Brooklyn. Forage direct trade flannel mixtape, beard put a bird on it farm-to-table leggings butcher PBR&B meh synth locavore readymade. Bushwick disrupt Neutra, craft beer Kickstarter +1 freegan actually Marfa cray iPhone. Carles American Apparel raw denim, Vice meh cliche semiotics disrupt Intelligentsia occupy actually mixtape.
Meh shabby chic High Life distillery direct trade, sustainable pickled Helvetica PBR flexitarian fanny pack wolf. Lo-fi hella High Life twee, fap Brooklyn mlkshk artisan paleo viral. Pop-up small batch meh Wes Anderson irony. Salvia fingerstache disrupt before they sold out, food truck 90's lo-fi Marfa synth chillwave typewriter tofu photo booth chambray Shoreditch. Raw denim flannel ethnic McSweeney's tofu selfies. Chambray mustache drinking vinegar Banksy, meh skateboard fixie cardigan chia umami Tonx. Pour-over bitters forage wayfarers VHS squid semiotics.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post’s comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
Thanks Sam for your comment. PanKogut
Lovely theme. It’s perfect for my next fashion blog. See you soon Dana

item.title: Archives
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
[archive cat="2" posts="4" orderby="name" order="ASC"]Books[/archive] [archive cat="2" posts="4" orderby="name" order="ASC"]Books[/archive] [archive cat="2" posts="5" orderby="date" order="DESC"]Magazine[/archive] [archive cat="2" posts="5" orderby="date" order="DESC"]Magazine[/archive]

Usage:

You can add a new page with your posts list. Just copy and past the shortcode above. cat --> you can find the number id of your category under Posts –> Categories –> Edit, then in the top bar you can find “category&tag_ID=3″. Without the cat, the shortcode will show all posts from the blog section. posts --> the number of posts that you want to show orderby --> author, title (post title), name (post slug), date, rand (random) order --> ASC (ascending) or DESC (descending)

Halvah chocolate bar pudding donut. Lemon drops soufflé marzipan chupa chups. Croissant jelly-o croissant chocolate cake cookie powder lemon drops lollipop muffin. Lemon drops fruitcake macaroon. Dessert dessert wafer jujubes gummies.

Toffee macaroon topping macaroon sugar plum. Wafer bonbon dessert. Croissant chocolate bar pudding danish soufflé wafer. Lollipop cupcake wafer dessert.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
Snippets ready to copy and paste in your posts and pages.

Dropcap

[dropcap]...[/dropcap] [dropcap]A[/dropcap]ll children, except one, grow up. They soon know that they will grow up, and the way Wendy knew was this. One day when she was two years old she was playing in a garden, and she plucked another flower and ran with it to her mother. I suppose she must have looked rather delightful, for Mrs. Darling put her hand to her heart and cried, “Oh, why can’t you remain like this for ever!” This was all that passed between them on the subject, but henceforth Wendy knew that she must grow up. You always know after you are two. Two is the beginning of the end.

Buttons

Color

The default value is grey, so you don't need to declare it. Other colors are: yellow, green, red, blue, purple and black. [button]...[/button]
[button color="yellow"]...[/button]
[button color="green"]...[/button]
[button color="red"]...[/button]
[button color="blue"]...[/button]
[button color="purple"]...[/button]
[button color="black"]...[/button] [button]Default Grey[/button] [button color="yellow"]Default Yellow[/button] [button color="green"]Default Green[/button] [button color="red"]Default Red[/button] [button color="blue"]Default Blue[/button] [button color="purple"]Default Purple[/button] [button color="black"]Default Black[/button]

Size

The default value is small, so you don't need to declare it. Other size available are: extra-small, medium, large and extra-large. [button color="blue" size="extra-small"]...[/button]
[button color="blue"]...[/button]
[button color="blue" size="medium"]...[/button]
[button color="blue" size="large"]...[/button]
[button color="blue" size="extra-large"]...[/button] [button color="blue" size="extra-small"]Extra Small[/button] [button color="blue"]Small[/button] [button color="blue" size="medium"]Medium[/button] [button color="blue" size="large"]Large[/button] [button color="blue" size="extra-large"]Extra Large[/button]

Type

The default value is square, so you don't need to declare it. Other type available are: round and pill. [button color="blue"]...[/button]
[button color="blue" type="round"]...[/button]
[button color="blue" type="pill"]...[/button] [button color="blue"]Square Button[/button] [button color="blue" type="round"]Round Button[/button] [button color="blue" type="pill"]Pill Button[/button]

Display

The default value is inline-block, so you don't need to declare it. Other display available are: inline and block. [button color="blue"]...[/button]
[button color="blue" display="inline"]...[/button]
[button color="blue" display="block"]...[/button] [button color="blue"]Inline-Block Display[/button]
[button color="blue" display="inline"]Inline Display[/button]
[button color="blue" display="block"]Block Display[/button]

Basic Usage:

[button url="http://pankogut.com"]...[/button] [button url="http://pankogut.com"]Button Text[/button]

Advanced Usage:

Other options are: > Target (default "_self") with value: "_blank" and "_parent". > Rel > Class: you can add your custom class > Title [button url="http://pankogut.com" color="red" size="extra-large" type="round" target="_blank" rel="publisher" class="custom" title="Custom Button" display="block"]...[/button] [button url="http://pankogut.com" color="red" size="extra-large" type="round" target="frame name" rel="publisher" class="custom" title="Custom Button" display="block"]Button Text[/button]

Alerts

Color

The default value is grey, so you don't need to declare it. Other colors are: yellow, green, red, blue, purple and black. [alert]...[/alert]
[alert color="yellow"]...[/alert]
[alert color="green"]...[/alert]
[alert color="red"]...[/alert]
[alert color="blue"]...[/alert]
[alert color="purple"]...[/alert]
[alert color="black"]...[/alert] [alert]Sweet roll muffin cookie applicake. Cotton candy wafer ice cream.[/alert] [alert color="yellow"]Sweet roll muffin cookie applicake. Cotton candy wafer ice cream.[/alert] [alert color="green"]Sweet roll muffin cookie applicake. Cotton candy wafer ice cream.[/alert] [alert color="red"]Sweet roll muffin cookie applicake. Cotton candy wafer ice cream.[/alert] [alert color="blue"]Sweet roll muffin cookie applicake. Cotton candy wafer ice cream.[/alert] [alert color="purple"]Sweet roll muffin cookie applicake. Cotton candy wafer ice cream.[/alert] [alert color="black"]Sweet roll muffin cookie applicake. Cotton candy wafer ice cream.[/alert]

Type

The default value is square, so you don't need to declare it. Other type available are: round and pill. [alert color="blue"]...[/alert]
[alert color="blue" type="round"]...[/alert]
[alert color="blue" type="pill"]...[/alert] [row-start] [one-third][alert color="blue"]Square Alert[/alert][/one-third] [one-third][alert color="blue" type="round"]Round Alert[/alert][/one-third] [one-third][alert color="blue" type="pill"]Pill Alert[/alert][/one-third] [row-end]

Text Align

The default value is center, so you don't need to declare it. Other values available are: left and center. [alert color="blue"]...[/alert]
[alert color="blue" text_align="left"]...[/alert]
[alert color="blue" text_align="right"]...[/alert] [row-start] [one-third][alert color="blue"]Text Center[/alert][/one-third] [one-third][alert color="blue" text_align="left"]Text Left[/alert][/one-third] [one-third][alert color="blue" text_align="right"]Text Right[/alert][/one-third] [row-end]

Basic Usage:

[alert]Alert Box Text[/alert] [alert]Alert Box Text[/alert]

Advanced Usage:

Other options are: > Width (default 100%) you can choose your custom width. > Class: you can add your custom class [alert color="yellow" type="round" width="50%" class="custom"]Alert Box Text[/alert] [alert color="black" type="round" width="50%" class="custom"]Alert Box Text[/alert]

Icons

The default size is 32px, but you can change it with the value "size". [icon type="twitter" size="16px"]
[icon type="twitter" size="32px"]
[icon type="twitter" size="64px"]
[icon type="twitter" size="126px"]
[icon type="twitter" size="256px"]
[icon type="twitter" size="16px"][icon type="twitter" size="32px"][icon type="twitter" size="64px"][icon type="twitter" size="128px"][icon type="twitter" size="256px"]

Post Formats

[icon type="standard"]
[icon type="aside"]
[icon type="image"]
[icon type="gallery"]
[icon type="video"]
[icon type="status"]
[icon type="quote"]
[icon type="link"]
[icon type="chat"]
[icon type="audio"]
[icon type="standard"][icon type="aside"][icon type="image"][icon type="gallery"][icon type="video"][icon type="status"][icon type="quote"][icon type="link"][icon type="chat"][icon type="audio"]

Social Icons

[icon type="digg"][/one-third] [one-third][icon type="reddit"]

Divider

Color Value: Grey (default), yellow, green, red, blue, purple, black. Type Value: Solid (default), dashed, dotted, filled, double-solid, double-dashed, double-dotted. Class Value: you can add your custom class. [divider]
[divider type="dashed" color="yellow"]
[divider type="dotted" color="green"]
[divider type="filled" color="red"]
[divider type="double-solid" color="blue"]
[divider type="double-dashed" color="purple"]
[divider type="double-dotted" color="black"]
 [divider] [divider type="dashed" color="yellow"] [divider type="dotted" color="green"] [divider type="filled" color="red"] [divider type="double-solid" color="blue"] [divider type="double-dashed" color="purple"] [divider type="double-dotted" color="black"]

Size

The default size is 100%. [divider width="20%"]

[divider type="dotted" color="green" width="40%"]
